nodes.text: The Naboo system was the location of an observation post. On one occasion, the observation post sent out starfighters to stop a malfunctioning RX-Series pilot droid unit that had hijacked its owner's starship on the planet Naboo. The droid managed to jump to hyperspace before the fighters could stop it, en route to the region of the galaxy where the planets Bothawui, Nal Hutta, and Rodia were located.
